title: NewsBreak - Sterling Surrenders Gains as Brexit Deal Hopes Recede
text:
NewsBreak - Sterling Surrenders Gains as Brexit Deal Hopes Recede

Forex 2 hours ago (Oct 17, 2019 14:32)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Sterling reversed gains on Thursday as hopes for a Brexit deal were dealt a serious blow after Northern Ireland's Democratic Unionist Party said it will vote against a Brexit deal. The DUP said the proposals are not beneficial to the economic wellbeing of Northern Ireland. The pound had rallied to multi-month highs earlier after Britain reached a last-minute deal with the European Union ahead of a planned October 31 Brexit deadline. down 0.2% at 1.2791 from earlier high of 1.2988 up 0.68% to 0.8682 from earlier low of 0.8576

NewsBreak - Sterling Surrenders Gains as Brexit Deal Hopes Recede
